title: End of my first semester in Cornell
content:
A mark on the end of my first semester in Cornell.
Finally… After a busy semester, finally I have some time to try some new pieces of music:
運命と恋心 Hope this winter be a productive one!
BTW, the cover image is credit to pixiv user 駒＠ついった:
呪縛 by 駒＠ついった on pixiv
summary: A mark on the end of my first semester in Cornell.
